_header: Of martyrs if we should mind
Title(s): Northern Homily Cycle; ‘De sancto Thoma episcopo Cantuariensi’
_description: ‘De sancto Thoma episcopo Cantuariensi’, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: Of martirs if we suld mindeþan sal we carp if we be kinde…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …þat es forto haue endles blisSo forto wirk Ihesu vs wys
BLHar4196.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             Altenglische Legenden: Neue Folge.
         Heilbronn: Henninger, 1881: 42-4.
